title: Novotel Imagica Khopoli opens its doors to guests
text:
By Pooja Shetty, Adlabs 
Adlabs Imagica and Aquamagica have given to the greater Mumbai region, India's first international standard theme and water parks. As a result, over the last few years the Khopoli area has become a premium leisure destination across a wide range of consumer categories seeking adventure and a leisure experience in close proximity to the city. Adding to this, is the recent opening of Novotel Imagica Khopoli, a five-star resort property by AccorHotels , adjacent to the theme parks. Surrounded by the lush greenery of the Sahyadri Hills, it is ideal for family holidays and for those seeking to relax and rejuvenate away from the bustling city life. In its opening phase, the hotel features 116 well-appointed rooms, which overlook the park, pool and the hills. The hotel plans to add another 171 rooms and suites later this year, taking the inventory to 287 rooms by the 1st quarter of 2016.
Novotel Imagica Khopoli features one of the largest meeting spaces in the Lonavla area with a pillar-less ballroom that can accommodate around 460 guests. The ballroom has a provision for breakout, which can be used for smaller meetings. Its 1600 square meter landscaped trellised garden area and air-conditioned marquee is perfect for couples seeking to tie the knot in an open and romantic setting.
Along with access to Adlabs Imagica & Aquamagica, you may unwind at the splendid swimming pool, a gym with stateof-the-art equipment and a kid's entertainment zone involving pottery sessions, arts, craft and more. Fun-filled special character performances during breakfast and the grand parade keep your spirits high and make your trip memorable. The 50 interconnected rooms allow you to keep an eye on your children, as they stay next door. The hotel also permits two children up to 12 years to share the room with their parents. As a limited period promotional offer, Novotel Imagica Khopoli guests may also avail of an Express Theme Park Check-In.
Pooja Shetty, of Adlabs says, "We have welcomed over a 2.5 million guest at Imagica & Aquamagica since opening. Our vision of an international standard theme park with a hotel on the premises is now a reality. With this, guests from across the country can plan a themed vacation with their family and friends anytime, as a quick getaway or on long weekends." There are exciting packages with entry to both parks and a stay at Novotel Imagica Khopoli, for those who wish to book early.
